name: ALL FOR HIM
description:
Shoot Gun - Left Mouse Button

Change Weapon - 1 and 2 keys

Reload Gun - R

Sprint - Shift

Quit Menu - Esc

In the middle of a forest stands the long abandoned ruins of the temple of Big Chungus. It used to be a bustling hub for the Holy Order of Redditors, who have long been inactive. 

You play as one of the last redditors, who returned to the temple of Big Chungus after the sky turned red, which was told in ancient prophecy to mean the end times have arrived. Gnomes surround and attack you in the ruins. Sacrifice their souls to Big Chungus, and discover the weapons he has blessed you with in order to DESTROY the wicked gnomes.
